author: Kuro
description: Just some shitty cogs made by Kuro that you better not use :p
install_msg:
Thanks for installing my repo!
I suggest you don't install any of the cogs if you don't know the uses, as it may/may not break your bot.
I'm not responsible for any breaks on your bot.
Use `[p]cog list kuro-cogs` to see available cogs.
